pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: fine weather (i.e. little or no clouds)

lessons.japanese: さっきまでの快晴がうそのようだ。
lessons.english: It's hard to believe it was so clear and sunny up to just now.
We have a lot of very fine days in October.

lessons.japanese: 天気予報によると、明日は快晴になるということだ。
lessons.english: According to the weather forecast, it will clear up tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 今日は快晴だ。これで一日中仕事が出来る。
lessons.english: It's fair today, so we can work all day.

lessons.japanese: 今日の天気予報によると明日は快晴らしい。
lessons.english: Today's weather forecast says that it is likely to be fine tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: さっきまでの快晴がうそのようだ。
lessons.english: It's hard to believe it was so clear and sunny up to just now.
We have a lot of very fine days in October.

lessons.japanese: 今日の天気予報によると明日は快晴らしい。
lessons.english: Today's weather forecast says that it is likely to be fine tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 今日は快晴だ。これで一日中仕事が出来る。
lessons.english: It's fair today, so we can work all day.

lessons.japanese: 天気予報によると、明日は快晴になるということだ。
lessons.english: According to the weather forecast, it will clear up tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 今日は快晴で気分がいい。
lessons.english: Today is a beautiful sunny day and I feel good.

lessons.japanese: 今日は快晴で気分がいい。
lessons.english: It's a sunny day today and I feel great.

lessons.japanese: 今日は快晴で気分がいい。
lessons.english: Today is a beautiful sunny day and I feel good.
